project.courseid: Information Security at Home and Beyond Accessibility Demo
project.title: Information Security at Home and Beyond Accessibility Demo
project.description:
Emphasis on Work-from-Home Security
The course addresses the most common information and cybersecurity risks at a time when businesses need it most.

Short & Focused
Each module takes up to 5 minutes to complete.

Practical
Each module ends with a quiz based on real-life cases. It not only assesses user knowledge, but also allows the employee to analyze the reason behind their choice.
